snippet: Congress has approved a deal to let the Veterans Affairs Department complete a long-delayed and over-budget medical center outside Denver.
abstract: Congress approves deal allowing Veterans Affairs Dept to complete long-delayed and over-budget medical center outside Denver; project is expected to cost nearly $1.7 billion, nearly triple original estimate.
lead_paragraph: Congress has approved a deal to let the Veterans Affairs Department complete a long-delayed and over-budget medical center outside Denver.
